H0.text: The main motto of which organisation is: 'Service Above Self'. Lions Club Member

H1.text: The main motto of which organisation is: 'Service Above Self'. Salvation Army Volunteer

H2.text: The main motto of which organisation is: 'Service Above Self'. Red Cross Worker

H3.text: The main motto of which organisation is: 'Service Above Self'. Rotarian

A4.text: The change of the second Rotarian motto in 2004, from 'He profits most who serves best' to 'They profit most who serve best', 99 years after its foundation, illustrates the move to general acceptance of women members in Rotary.

A5.text: Rotary International's self-declared mission is to 'provide service to others, promote integrity, and advance world understanding, goodwill, and peace through [the] fellowship of business, professional, and community leaders'.
